name: Palm Heights Luxury Villa
description: Stunning 5-bedroom luxury villa with modern architecture and premium finishes
fullDescription: This exquisite 5-bedroom luxury villa in the heart of Maitama features contemporary design, state-of-the-art amenities, infinity pool, home theater, and breathtaking views. Perfect for executives and high-net-worth individuals.

name: Ikoyi Penthouse Suite
description: Ultra-modern penthouse with panoramic city views and premium amenities
fullDescription: A breathtaking penthouse offering 360-degree views of Lagos, featuring 4 spacious bedrooms, smart home integration, private elevator access, concierge service, and exclusive rooftop garden.

name: Asokoro Prime Estate
description: Beautiful gated community estate with premium residential properties
fullDescription: Secure, gated residential estate in prestigious Asokoro featuring spacious plots, excellent security, 24/7 power supply, and proximity to top schools and hospitals.

name: Abuja Short-Let Apartment
description: Fully furnished short-let apartment perfect for business travelers
fullDescription: Comfortable, fully-equipped apartment in the heart of CBD offering flexibility for short-term stays. Includes housekeeping, WiFi, and business facilities.

name: Victoria Island Commercial Hub
description: Prime commercial property in Nigeria's top business district
fullDescription: Prestigious commercial space in Victoria Island with high foot traffic, excellent for retail, offices, or mixed-use development. Premium location near major businesses and entertainment.
